dim global
class Global_class function method() method="Ich bin von der globalen Methode" & ", spooler.param=" & spooler.param end function end class
sub spooler_init set global = new Global_class spooler_log.msg "spooler_init des Spooler-Skripts ausgeführt" end sub
spooler_log.msg "Spooler-Skript geladen."

object_set_class.name: Dokumente
object_set_class.script:
dir_name = "c:\tmp\spooler" set fso = createobject( "Scripting.FileSystemObject" ) script_index = 0
class Testobjekt
sub construct( file_par ) dim lev set file = file_par lev = mid( file.name, instr( file.name & "-", "-" ) + 1 ) lev = left( lev, instr( lev & ".", "." ) - 1 ) level = lev end sub
sub process( new_level ) spooler_log.msg "process " & level & " ==> " & new_level file.move dir_name & "\" & new_level & "\" & file.name level = new_level end sub
public level private file
end class
class Object_set_class
sub spooler_open() dim files dim file dim i
spooler_log.msg "spooler.param=" & spooler.param spooler_log.msg "spooler_task.object_set.low_level=" & spooler_task.object_set.low_level spooler_log.msg "spooler_task.object_set.high_level=" & spooler_task.object_set.high_level
set files=fso.getFolder(dir_name).Files
file_array = Array i = 1 for each file in files redim preserve file_array(i) set file_array(i) = file i = i + 1 next
index = 1 end sub
sub spooler_close() dim dummy dummy = 0 end sub
function spooler_get() if spooler_eof() then exit function
dim object set object = new Testobjekt object.construct file_array(index) spooler_log.msg "index=" & index & ", level=" & object.level & ", script_index=" & script_index index = index + 1 script_index = script_index + 1
set spooler_get = object end function
function spooler_eof() spooler_eof = index > ubound(file_array) end function
private file_array private index
end class
sub spooler_init spooler_task.wake_when_directory_changed dir_name end sub
function spooler_make_object_set set spooler_make_object_set = new Object_set_class end function
